item.title: The Twelve-Factor App
item.description: The twelve-factor app is a methodology for building software-as-a-service apps, and its not depend on any languages, its works with every language. Why we use 12 Factor Methodology Minimize time and cost of getting a new dev up to speed Minimize requirements on the underlying OS, maximize portability between different enviroments Ease deployment on modern cloud plateform. The Twelve Factors I. Codebase: One codebase tracked in revision control, many deploys II.
